sentences.sContent: This iguana is one of the few lizards found in that cold climate.
sentences.sContent_eng: This iguana is one of the few lizards found in that cold climate.
sentences.sCn: 这种鬣蜥是在寒冷的气候条件下发现的少数蜥蜴当中的一种。

sentences.sContent: The green iguana’s extensive range comprises the rain forests of northern Mexico, Central America, the Caribbean Islands, and southern Brazil.
sentences.sContent_eng: The green iguana’s extensive range comprises the rain forests of northern Mexico, Central America, the Caribbean Islands, and southern Brazil.
sentences.sCn: 绿鬣蜥分布广泛，活动范围包括墨西哥北部、中美洲、加勒比岛和巴西南部的雨林。

trans.tranCn: [动]鬣蜥(一种产于南美洲和西印度群岛的大蜥蜴)
